title: Riot Support - ticket response time?
body:
Hey guys just wondering how long Riot normally take to respond to a ticket? It's been 4 days and I haven't even received a message from them saying my ticket has been read and something is being done. Finding it quite frustrating as I am trying to get back my account which has been hacked and I'm not getting any responses from Riot. 

I also made another ticket yesterday asking them to look into my first ticket and for someone to let me know that my issue is being looked into. Still no response on either.

Is this normal? What can I do to make sure I get a response from Riot?

Thanks guys.

replies.body: i just created a ticket in my LOL account and how long should i wait for the respond?

Depending on the issue, your ticket may have been fielded to a large volume.  It's not ideal, but we will respond as soon as we can!  If you want, toss me your ticket number and I'd be happy to check the status for you!

I have a ticket in I had just put in about an issue with leaver buster and my client lagging so had it wouldn't let me load. If I may not cause you any trouble could you check my ticket for me? Ticket Number: 32839021
Are there support agents who exclusively post on the boards and those who exclusively answer support tickets? I only seem to see you, Broporo and DatFatRaccoon on the Help & Support Boards.
Yup!  You'll find player support mainly through the ticketing system, but we also try and help through other venues too.  This includes the boards, twitter, or whatever else that may come!

Is it possible if you could read this old accounts ticket history up until the recent one i posted yesterday I believe, its been a couple years since ive logged in on this account website wise since im permanently banned on this one.
@porocles could you check for me too? TICKET #33847848
Whatever you do, don't bump your original ticket as that will move it to the back of the queue.
4 days is a long time. I suggest you wait a few more days and send a new ticket if they still don't reply.
